attributes.action: Recognize Parental Alienation as a criminal offence
attributes.additional_details:
Countries around the world are more and more beginning to recognize deliberate Parental Alienation as a form of emotional child abuse. Help the U.K. be the second country in the world to make this last form of Child Abuse stop by signing the petition, asking the Government to debate the matter urgently, and make such behaviour by a resident parent a criminal offence.
Please Note;
Parental Alienation is NOT gender specific it affects all sexes and ages. it occurs when one parent seeks to remove the other parent and his or her family from having any contact with their child. It can cause devastating long term emotional damage to the child or children exposes to such abuse.
STOP CHILD ABUSE > FULL STOP.!
